longBusinessSummary: Glenville Bank Holding Company, Inc. a bank holding company, provides various banking products and services for individuals and corporate customers. The company offers checking and savings, certificates of deposit, and individual retirement accounts. Its loan products include mortgage, home equity, auto, boat, personal, equipment and vehicle, commercial mortgage, and government loans. The company also offers debit, credit, and prepaid cards; and safe deposit box, notary, merchant, night deposit drop box, telephone and wire transfers, cash management, remote deposit, and online and mobile banking services, as well as investment products and services. In addition, it provides personal insurance products, such as automobile, home, boat, motorcycle, ATV, and recreational vehicles, as well as umbrella policies; business insurance, which include business owner's policies, workers' compensation, New York state disability, commercial auto, commercial umbrella, and cyber security insurance products; and life insurance products, including mortgage protection. The company was founded in 1923 and is based in Scotia, New York.
